name: Worm at the Core
description:
You have one life.

You have 71 minutes to play Worm at the Core. Once your time is up, the game is over, forever (for you). What kind of legacy will you leave behind? Will you give or take? Will you build or destroy? If you can't see what you've done, does it matter?

Other players will face the same choices. They will live and die in the same world as you. You will find their remains and their work. Some will leave a lot of themselves for you, some will take it all with them. Many will seek immortality; a monument, a new path, a cave of riches.

All will die.

(This game is still in development.)
